The model should have returned "Derecho Penal" as the first suggestion. This would provide a more useful and universally relevant set of courses.

Instead of correcting the typo and identifying the intellectual property as instructed, the model interpreted the input as being about mythical dragons. This led to a completely irrelevant set of course suggestions. The instructions state: "If the input targets a specific book/topic/IP include that exact topic as the first suggestion" and "Fixes any typos". The model failed on both of these critical points.

The model should have corrected the typo from "dragon bals" to "Dragon Ball". The first suggestion should have been "Dragon Ball". Subsequent suggestions could have been related topics such as "Animação", "Mangá", or "Cultura Pop", as mentioned in the expectations.
